name: CVE-2021-36221
description: Go before 1.15.15 and 1.16.x before 1.16.7 has a race condition that can lead to a net/http/httputil ReverseProxy panic upon an ErrAbortHandler abort.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:golang:go:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:golang:go:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:33:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:34:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:35:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:timesten_in-memory_database:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:siemens:scalance_lpe9403_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:siemens:scalance_lpe9403:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
